title: [MINDSET] Ep. 61: 6 Steps to Upgrade Your Relationship with Money w/ Morgana Rae
description:
If money was a person, who would they be?

This week Ash talks with Morgana Rae a ten times #1 International best selling author and a top money expert and coach. Morgana shares her 6 steps to upgrade your relationship with money and how to uncover your blocks to financial abundance. She shares 2 transformational questions to ask yourself when ready to change how money is present in your life. The root cause of your money relationship often comes from a very specific event, and it isn’t what you think.

If you suffer from anxiety around the topic of money, Morgana shares the tools to help resolve and pivot this perspective and relationship.

Do you want money to be a monster, or a sweet honey, in your life? Through the story of her personal journey, and working with Ash, Morgana threads her steps together within this visual process of transforming your money monster, into a money honey. Definitely stick around for the post episodes notes with Ash this week, she gets personal about where her money relationship stems from and shares actionable advice on working through breaking down financial barriers.

In This Episode, You Will Learn How To:
1. Recognize the connection between your body and money.
2. Get closer to the root cause of where money sits for you.
3. Differentiate between your mindset and heartset with money.
4. Break free from your limiting financial relationship.

Resources:
Financial Alchemy: Twelve Months of Magic and Manifestation (Volume 1) By Morgana Rae

Where to find Morgana Rae:
www.morganarae.com

Want to land the job you love? Visit youturnpodcast.com/joboffer
